unit.name: Pharaoh
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm,Dust to Dust, Fear, Fearless, Flammable, Undead, Undying Will, Light Armour, Mummys Curse

unit.name: Nomarch
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fear, Fearless, Flammable, Undead, Undying Will, Light Armour, Mummys Curse

unit.name: Death Cult Hierarch
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Undead

unit.name: Casket of Phatep
unit.description: Rsr 2, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Channel (1), Divine Light, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Not a Leader, Phateps Curse, Undead, War Machine, Aegis (5+), Light Armour, Necropolis Guards: Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Poison Attacks, Halberd

unit.name: Tomb Harbinger
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Flammable, Royal Guard, Undead, Light Armour, Guardians Wrath, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Tomb Architect
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Flammable, Master of Stone, Undead, Light Armour

unit.name: Skeletons
unit.description: Rsr 7, 20-60 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Light Armour, Shield

unit.name: Skeleton Archers
unit.description: Rsr 6, 10-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Light Armour, Aspen Bow (5+)

unit.name: Skeleton Cavalry
unit.description: Rsr 4, 10-24 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Vanguard, Light Armour, Shield, Rider: Light Lance, Skeletal Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Skeleton Scouts
unit.description: Rsr 4, 5-10 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Light Troops, Scout, Undead, Vanguard, Rider: Aspen Bow (5+), Skeletal Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Skeleton Chariots
unit.description: Rsr 3, 3-7 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Bound in Death, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Undead, Heavy Armour, Charioteer (2): Aspen Bow (5+), Halberd, Skeletal Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Chariot Host, Impact Hits (D3+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Necropolis Guard
unit.description: Rsr 3, 15-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Light Armour, Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Tomb Cataphracts
unit.description: Rsr 2, 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Light Armour, Rider: Lethal Strike, Halberd, Amuut: Harnessed, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Shabtis
unit.description: Rsr 2, 3-8 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Light Armour

unit.name: Great Vultures
unit.description: Rsr 3, 3-9 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Undead, Hard Target (1)

unit.name: Scarab Swarms
unit.description: Rsr 5, 2-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Undead, Distracting, Hard Target (1), Chitinous Tide, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Shabti Archers
unit.description: Rsr 2, 3-8 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Light Armour, Great Aspen Bow (5+)

unit.name: Sand Stalkers
unit.description: Rsr 2, 3-7 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Light Troops, Petrifying Gaze (3+), Halberd

unit.name: Charnel Catapult
unit.description: Rsr 2, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Dust to Dust, Fearless, Undead, War Machine, Move or Fire, Charnel Catapult (5+)

unit.name: Sand Scorpion
unit.description: Rsr 2, single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Underground Ambush, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Battle Sphinx
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Rider (4): Lethal Strike, Light Lance, Battle Sphinx: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Dread Sphinx
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Autonomous, Ensouled Statue, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Colossal Kopesh, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Tomb Reapers
unit.description: Rsr 2, 2-4 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 50x75 mm, Autonomous, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Swiftstride, Lethal Strike

unit.name: Colossus
unit.description: Rsr 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 50x50 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fearless, Light Armour, Grind Attacks (D3)

mount.name: Skeletal Horse
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Skeleton Chariot
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Skeletal Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D3+3), Inanimate

mount.name: Amuut
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Ensouled Statue, Fear, Harnessed, Poison Attacks

mount.name: Ark of Ages
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Sacred Ark, War Platform, Well of Souls, Aegis (5+), Guard (2): Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Poison Attacks, Aspen Bow (5+), Bound Spirits: Harnessed, Magical Attacks, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

mount.name: Sha Guardian
mount.description: Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Ensouled Statue, Eternal Guardian, Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks

item.name: Resurrected
item.description: Some unit profiles contain the additional Characteristic Resurrected, shortened Rsr, which determines the number of Health Points Raised with Death is Only the Beginning (Hereditary Attribute Spell).

item.name: Autonomous
item.description: Undead units consisting entirely of models with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal even when outside the range of friendly models Commanding Presence. The unit must still pass a Discipline Test in order to do so if within 8" of non-Fleeing enemy units.

item.name: Dust to Dust
item.description: At the end of any phase in which the Hierophant was removed as a casualty, every unit in the army with Dust to Dust must pass a Discipline Test or lose a number of Health Points equal to the amount by which the test was failed, with no saves of any kind allowed. These Health Point losses are allotted following the rules for Unstable. The number of Health Points lost is reduced by 1 if the unit is within range of Rally Around the Flag. At the end of the Player Turn in which the Hierophant was removed as a casualty, a new Hierophant may be selected. In order to do so, nominate a friendly Wizard Character. This Character becomes the new Hierophant. At the start of each friendly Player Turn after the armys Hierophant has been removed as a casualty and no new Hierophant has been selected, every unit with Dust to Dust must once again pass a Discipline Test or lose Health Points as described above.

item.name: Ensouled Statue
item.description: The model gains Undead and Dust to Dust. If more than half of the models in a unit have Ensouled Statue, reduce the number of Health Points lost by this unit due to Dust to Dust and Unstable by 1.

item.name: Hierophant
Hierophant (Wizard Master)
item.description: One of a Kind. An Undying Dynasties army must include a single model with this Universal Rule. When the Hierophant casts Death is Only the Beginning as a non-Bound Spell, you may choose to set the spell range to 18" (instead of the spells normal target restrictions).

item.name: Underground Ambush
item.description: The model follows the rules for Ambush, with the following exception. Instead of entering the Battlefield from the Board Edge: - 1. Choose an arriving unit with Underground Ambush. - 2. Place the unit anywhere on the Battlefield in a legal formation and following the Unit Spacing rule. - 3. Roll a D6: - If 5-6 is rolled, the unit arrives where it was initially placed. - If 1-4 is rolled, move the unit (without changing the direction it is facing) 2D6" in a randomly chosen direction. If this would bring the unit within 1" of other units, Impassable Terrain, or the Board Edge, the unit stops 1" short of them and each model in the Ambushing unit must take a Dangerous Terrain (1) Test. The unit may then perform a Pivot (and must follow the Unit Spacing rule after the Pivot). None of these manoeuvres prevent the unit from moving following the rules for Ambush afterwards. - 4. Repeat steps 1-3 for all other arriving units with Underground Ambush.

item.name: Undying Will
item.description: Units with one or more models with Undying Will gain +2 Offensive Skill, +2 Defensive Skill, Lethal Strike, and replace their Shooting Weapons Aim with (4+). Characters, Beasts, models with Ensouled Statue, and model parts with Harnessed are not affected by Undying Will.

item.name: Aspen Bow
Aspen Bow (1+)
Aspen Bow (2+)
Aspen Bow (3+)
Aspen Bow (4+)
Aspen Bow (5+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 24", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0, Volley Fire. This weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim.

item.name: Great Aspen Bow
Great Aspen Bow (1+)
Great Aspen Bow (2+)
Great Aspen Bow (3+)
Great Aspen Bow (4+)
Great Aspen Bow (5+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 36", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 2, Volley Fire. This weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim.

item.name: Mummys Curse
item.description: When the model with Mummys Curse is removed as a casualty, the model which caused the final wound suffers 1 hit with Strength 6 and Armour Penetration 10. This is treated as a Ranged Attack. If more than one model was part of the action which brought the downfall of the model with Mummys Curse, randomise which of those models suffers the hit.

item.name: Godslayer
item.description: Enchantment: Great Weapon. The wielder gains +1 Attack Value when using this weapon. Attacks made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks, and gain Multiple Wounds (2, against Aegis) (note that the latter also applies against models with Aegis Saves with Conditional Application).

item.name: Scourge of Kings
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon or Paired Weapons. When using this weapon, the wielders Attack Value is set to 6. Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks and must reroll failed to-wound rolls when fighting a Duel.

item.name: Jackals Blessing
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +2 Health Points and Fortitude (5+).

item.name: Suns Embrace
item.description: Enchantment: Shield. The bearer gains Distracting while using this Shield.

item.name: Banner of the Entombed
item.description: 0-2 per Army. Core and Battle Standard Bearer only. If taken by a Character, the bearer gains Underground Ambush. If taken by a R&F model, the bearers unit gains Underground Ambush and additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation. Standard Height models using this banner to Ambush must arrive in a formation containing exactly 5 models per rank (except for the last) and cannot make a Reform (or a Swift Reform) during this Player Turn. A unit with Underground Ambush also counts towards Entombed.

item.name: Sacred Hourglass
item.description: Dominant. The bearer may reroll failed Casting Attempts that were rolled using 2 Magic Dice (by rerolling both Magic Dice).

item.name: Crown of the Pharaohs
item.description: Pharaohs and Nomarchs only. The bearer increases the range of its Commanding Presence by 6". At the start of each of your Player Turns, the bearer may lose Undying Will until the start of your next Player Turn and choose a friendly unit within 12". This unit gains Undying Will until the start of your next Player Turn.

item.name: Steeds of Nephet-Ra
item.description: Models with at least one Skeletal Horse model part in the bearers unit gain Ghost Step and +4" March Rate.

item.name: Book of the Dead
item.description: The bearer can cast Death is Only the Beginning as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8) and the following modification: The spells range is changed to 12" Aura.

item.name: Ankh of Naptesh
item.description: The bearer gains Hierophant. R&F models in the bearers unit gain Fortitude (6+).

item.name: Blessed Wrappings
item.description: The bearer gains +1 Health Point and loses Flammable if it had it (note that this does not prevent the model from gaining Flammable from other sources).

item.name: Death Mask of Teput
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer suffer 2 Offensive Skill.

item.name: Sekhem Sceptre
item.description: The bearer gains Autonomous and Stubborn.

item.name: Sandstorm Cloak
item.description: Models on foot only. The bearer gains Fly (5", 15"), Light Troops, and Swiftstride, and can perform a Sweeping Attack that causes 2D6 hits with Strength 2 and Armour Penetration 1.

item.name: Scroll of Desiccation
item.description: After determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the Pre-Game Sequence), choose a Field, Forest, or Water Terrain Feature. This Terrain Feature ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses all its rules. It is treated as Dangerous Terrain (1) for all enemy units.

item.name: Sacred Ark
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly Wizards add +6" to the range of their non-Bound Spells for each Ark of Ages they are within 12" of. Spells of type Aura only gain +3" range.

item.name: Well of Souls
item.description: Universal Rule. One use only. May be activated at the start of any of your Magic Phases. Until the start of your next Player Turn, whenever either player would draw a Flux Card, they draw the Well of Souls Flux Card instead (if either player doesnt draw a Flux Card, that player ignores this effect).

item.name: Eternal Guardian
item.description: Personal Protection. When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by half, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Soul Conduit
item.description: Universal Rule. If the model is present on the Battlefield at the beginning of a friendly Magic Phase, you dont draw a Flux Card. Instead apply the following: - 5 Magic Dice (both players) - 4+D3 Veil Tokens (Active Player)

item.name: Divine Light
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy Wizards within 36" of one or more Caskets of Phatep suffer a -1 modifier to their casting rolls. When a Casket of Phatep is removed as a casualty, all units within 12" suffer 3D3+3 hits with Strength 1 and Armour Penetration 10.

item.name: Phateps Curse
item.description: Universal Rule. Unless this model made an Advance Move or March Move during the current Player Turn, it can cast the following Bound Spell with Power Level (6/6): Type: Damage, Hex, Range 36". Duration: Instant. The target must take a Discipline Test rolling an additional D6. If failed, the target suffers a number of hits equal to the amount by which the test was failed. Hits are resolved with Armour Penetration 10 and wound automatically.

item.name: Guardians Wrath
item.description: Attack Attribute. Close Combat. Model parts without Harnessed in the bearers unit gain Battle Focus.

item.name: Royal Guard
item.description: Universal Rule. The model counts as a R&F model for the purpose of Undying Will. If in the same unit as a Pharaoh or a Nomarch, unless another model does so first: - A Tomb Harbinger must issue a Duel. - A Tomb Harbinger must accept a Duel.

item.name: Master of Stone
item.description: Universal Rule. Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), and at the start of each friendly Player Turn, choose a friendly unit consisting entirely of models with Ensouled Statue within 18" of the Tomb Architect. This unit gains Fortitude (5+) until the start of your next Player Turn or until the Tomb Architect is removed as a casualty, whichever comes first.

item.name: Bound in Death
item.description: Universal Rule. R&F models in this unit must be fewer than 3 before hits can be distributed onto Characters with the same Type and Height as this unit.

item.name: Chariot Host
item.description: Special Attack. If the model parts unit has at least one Full Rank, and there is a model in the rank directly behind it (in the same file), its Impact Hits cause an additional hit (normally D3+2 instead of D3+1).

item.name: Legion Charioteers
item.description: Universal Rule. The model loses Light Troops and gains Scoring. Its Charioteers gain Devastating Charge (+1 Str, Fight in Extra Rank).

item.name: Chitinous Tide
item.description: Attack Attribute. Close Combat. The model can make a number of Supporting Attacks equal to its Attack Value.

item.name: Petrifying Gaze
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 12", Shots D6+1, Str 2, AP 10, Quick to Fire. When rolling to wound with this attack, use the targets Agility instead of the targets Resilience. For Multipart Models, use the highest Agility value.

item.name: Charnel Catapult
item.description: Artillery Weapon. This Artillery Weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim. It can be fired in two ways: - Catapult (4x4), Range 12-60", Shots 1, Str 3 [7], AP 0 [4], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)] - Catapult (6x6), Range 12-48", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. For the purpose of Panic Tests, a unit suffering one or more Health Point losses from this weapon is treated as having suffered 25% Health Point losses. Panic Tests caused by this weapon are taken at 1 Discipline.

item.name: Colossal Kopesh
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks with this weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence).

item.name: Giant Aspen Bow
Giant Aspen Bow (5+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)]. This Artillery Weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim.

item.name: Scales of Destiny
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. The wielder suffers -1 Attack Value and -1 Armour and can cast the following spells as Bound Spells with Power Level (4/8): - Fates Judgement (Divination) - Ice and Fire (Cosmology)

item.name: Commander of the Terracotta Army
Terracotta Army selected
item.description: - The following models must be upgraded with +1Resilience,1Agility, and Ensouled Statue: - Skeleton Archers, Skeleton Cavalry, and Skeleton Scouts for +1pt/model - Skeletons for +2pts/model - Necropolis Guard for +5pts/model, and may only add up to 15 additional models pe runit - Charnel Catapult for +10pts/model - R&F Skeleton Chariots and Caskets of Phatep for +15 pts/model. Skeleton Chariots may only add up to 3 additional models per unit - Pharaohs and Nomarchs for +15pts/model ,Death Cult Hierarchs,Tomb Harbingers, and Tomb Architects for +10 pts/model, and lose Flammable if they had it. Models on Ark of Ages or Sha Guardian do not gain +1 Resilience - The Resurrected value of all models is set to 1. - Non-Flying models in the army with Underground Ambush and / or Light Troops lose these Model Rules (and cannot gain them in any way). - Great Vultures, Scarab Swarms, and Tomb Reapers may not be taken in the army. - R&F models with a Type other than Beast that gain Ensouled Statue can benefit from Undying Wil l(despite having Ensouled Statue; models parts with Harnessed remain unaffected).

item.name: Lord of the Barrow Legion
Barrow Legion selected
item.description: - Skeletons and Skeleton Archers must take Heavy Armour for +1 pt/model. Skeletons may replace Spears and Shields with Halberds for free. - Skeleton Cavalry may take Lances for+2pts/model and may gain +1Armour and suffer -1" AdvanceRateand -2" March Rate for +3 pts/model. - R&F Skeleton Chariots may replace Halberds with Lances for +5pts/model. - Necropolis Guard must be upgraded with Heavy Armour for +1pt/model, and may only add up to 20 additional models per unit. - Scarab Swarms must be upgraded with Aegis (5+), Aegis (3+, against non-Magical Attacks), Ghost Step, Magical Attacks, and their Resurrected value is set to 1 for +28 pts/model. They may only add up to 2 additional models per unit, and there can only be max. 7 Scarab Swarm models per army. - Models with Towering Presence and/or Large Cavalry may not be taken in the army. - Models with Underground Ambush and/or Scout lose these Model Rules (and cannot gain them in anyway). - Non-Flying models with Heavy Armour lose Light Troops (and cannot gain it in anyway).
